biotools.summary: ChipSeg is an automatic tool to segment bacteria and mammalian cells cultured in microfluidic devices. ChipSeg is a computational tool to segment bacterial and mammalian cells cultured in microfluidic devices and imaged by time-lapse microscopy.

bioschemas.name: ChipSeg
bioschemas.summary: ChipSeg is an automatic tool to segment bacteria and mammalian cells cultured in microfluidic devices. ChipSeg is a computational tool to segment bacterial and mammalian cells cultured in microfluidic devices and imaged by time-lapse microscopy.
